#id=1
#text=Today is grocery day , I go every Thursday .
#id=2
#text=I check the paper on Wednesday and try to to match all the coupons I can to each sale .
#id=3
#text=I grab my coupon book and head it to the store .
#id=4
#text=AS I walk in there are item s stack that are unadvertised deals and I check the out to see if I need anything .
#id=5

#text=I walk into the store and the way it is laid out I can easily find the items that I need pretty quickly , grocery shopping is not my favorite past time , I go to the deli counter and get lunch meat for help yourself nights and school lunches .
#id=6
#text=I then head to the meat department to get some chicken and a roast for Sunday .
#id=7
#text=Now time for the isles and my coupon matches , I head down each isle relativity quickly since I already know pretty much what I am going to buy and how much of it I need .
#id=8
#text=I finish each isle and have all of my necessities .
#id=9
#text=I go over to the bakery to see what they have on sale today and see a large carrot roll with cream cheese filling .
#text=So I place that in my cart and head for the checkout isle .
#text=I place all my purchases on the belt near the cashier and watch as each one is scanned , She totals my purchase and I pay for them .
#text=As I leave the store I look at my watch and realize it took me much less time as usual .
#text=Now I can enjoy the rest of my day !
